review: I am deeply thankful to Dr. Archana mam for her exceptional expertise and unwavering support throughout our conceiving  journey, which led to our successful conception. Her dedication and compassionate care were truly instrumental in making our dream come true. I would also like to express my heartfelt gratitude to Sister Rajmani for her invaluable support during this challenging time. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Archana mam (Mannath Fertility clinic) and her team for their outstanding professionalism and genuine care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Archana mam is best doctor for IVF treatment in  Bangalore. The whole Mannat staff is very friendly and patient. We visited her as I was unable to conceive from 8 years,with her expertise and knowledge of every issue in detail helped me to conceive in first attempt. Thank you Mam and whole Mannat staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Special thanks to Archana Mam For all the support and All Medical Staff who made us feel Mannat and team as our family from the very first day we visited to the clinic and throughout the treatment she is very much supportive to us and every patient who visits here.

It was about the success towards our parenthood with their great service & selfless support.

I hope we will have lots of great memories with the team here as the journey begins now.

Thanks a lot once again to complete team

review:

it‚Äôs very painful losing a baby after 17 weeks of pregnancy which doctors there will not understand. ****** ** *** **** * ***** **** ***** ** ****** ***** ******* ********* ********** ** *** ** *** now we are punished though out our life for the wrong step. review: Good morning all I m from Bangalore First I would like touch the feet of my god Dr Archana Agrawal mam she is really great as person superb as a doctor. I took her consultation.She personally scanned my sonography & gave straight point treatment.Really her trust me correct treatment With few tablets works natural processes for pregnancy.a couple are trying for beby from last four years Lot of doctors lot of tablets unsuccessfully years.In that I m in that female patient having PCOS PCOD Thyroid high other issues and husband also having diebats as well.We fear about IVF IUI cost rate.but thanks to Archana mam and her Mannat clinic staff gave me comfort environment and confidence. We both are from middle class family staying in Bangalore.last few years we faced financial problem here we didn‚Äôt pay huge bills and so many tests tablets as well in Mannat clinic. Mannet clinic is really reasonable for all. I would like share one emotional experience in pandamic situation I have gone through this all treatment but Archana mam and her staff took care lot .very cleaned and friendly environment at clinic. I literally cried when I got to knw I m pregnant. I really recommend Archana mam.everyone those who wants good news in their home.Plz don‚Äôt waste your money other hospital and huge bills. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******* ******* ** ****** ********* ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ***** From the moment you step into the clinic, you're greeted by a team of dedicated professionals who prioritize patient well-being above all else. Dr. Archana expertise is evident in her thorough evaluations and precise diagnoses, but what truly sets her apart is her unwavering compassion. She takes the time to listen to her patients, addressing their concerns with empathy and understanding.

We went there for infertility issue and Dr Archana suggested some test .After test are done ,Madam suggest IVF is the best option for my wife. We took time and decided go for it. Madam also explained everything in details about the procedures. By god grace and doctor‚Äôs positivity, my wife conceived in the first attempt.
I want to personally thanks each one at Mannat fertility clinic. Specially to Dr Archana, Dr Samrakshini, Sister Rajamani.
Moreover, the collaborative environment at Mannat fertility clinic ensures that patients receive comprehensive care from a multidisciplinary team. Doctors,Nurses and  staff work seamlessly together to create a supportive and efficient healthcare experience. This cohesive approach not only enhances patient outcomes but also fosters a sense of trust and reassurance.
If you're looking for your infertility issue , I will definitely recommend Dr. Archana Agrawal and the remarkable staff at Mannat fertility clinic ,Marathalli,Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
We visited Mannat in late November 2022. Dr.Archana heard us out and right away started treatment as we didn‚Äôt wanted to delay further. She explained in detail the whole process as to how she will proceed and things that we need to take care of. She is someone who will advise you to focus on your health, diet, exercise, stress level and not rely only on meds. What we loved about her is that she didn‚Äôt make any tall claims nor any false promises. She respected our decision of going ahead with one cycle of IUI even when she knew it may not be successful. My whole process of IVF was very smooth under her guidance and I conceived in my first cycle. 
Things are not mechanical here. Everyone in Mannat, be it the ladies at the reception desk, the team of sisters led by the amazing Rajmani sister, Dr.Trina, the lab technicians or Dr.Archana, will always greet you with a smile, ask about your health or if your eating well, calm you down when you are stressed. There is  a sense of comfort and  positivity here. I highly recommend Mannat.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the great clinics in Bangalore, they take personal care for you and are very patient and solution oriented. The staff is also super caring. In a city crowded with multi-speciality hospital where health care professionals are very distant and uncaring, at mannat they make you feel heard and cared for.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went for a general consultation *** **** ******* ****** ** *** ***** ******* *** ******* **** *********** ***** **** ****** we conveyed many times we are not planning for the child as yet and even if we do we will go naturally first (crux is we never visited for this purpose) Dr. Agarwal advised  to have  contraceptive pills  which actually avoids pregnancy. ************ ** **** ***** *** ***** **** **** *** ******** ****** ** ***** ****** ** **** ** **** ** ******** hence we consulted a friend doc *** ** * ************* *** *********** *** ********* *** ***** ***** ** **** **** ****** ** ********* *** ****** ********* *** *** **** ** ** **** ******* ********* *** **** ******* ** ** **** ** ** ******** ** **** I am writing this review so that it can help others become prey!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Read this carefully before you consult this doctor. I was going through irregular period. The doctor made me take a home pregnancy test at clinic and then performed some sonography immediately. *** ** * ** ******** ** *** ***** ******** *** ****** **** ***** ***** ** * ***** ***** Tho I told her I did not had unprotected sex. In the end it was because of stress my periods was delayed. ** *** *** * **** ** ****** ***** *** *** ****** **** ******** ***** ********* I would highly recommend not to visit her. Like NO.
reply_text: hi neha thanks for choosing mannat for the time you needed the medical support , so let me tell you when you have a protected sex there are chances of failure of 2 to 22 / so its our duty to be sure about it , and scan is one of the test .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would definitely recommend Mannat. Dr.Archana is very efficient and took time to understand and provided the needed treatment and in the first cycle itself I conceived. She had great patience and used to listen and answer all our queries.
The support staff nurses, radiologist, lab technician and front desk too were always welcoming and had a smile on their face always, which gives some good approachability towards them for any sort of queries.
In terms of pricing, I found that the cost is also very economical. With all the facilities like samples collection, scans, etc in the hospital itself put me in very comfortable position. 
We had a 2-year-old baby and with him playing and making noise, the staff was also kind enough to support us and we never felt that we are disturbing. 
We are very thankful for Dr.Archana.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ** * **** ****** ***** **** ******** My request is that only to take less consulatation amount from patients who they are coming regularly like by month on month visits because if we calculate total 10 visits, it will be 7000/- for me.   All staffs are really good. Clean and hygienic environment in clinic. I would like to thank Dr. Karthika and Dr. Archana for better suggestion in critical time when admitted to hospital. Well baby and well mother after all medical procedure. I recommend this clinic to all who is having pregnancy issue either natural or IVF.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from PCOD. Earlier we got checked from other doctor's as well but many doctor's told us that its nearly impossible for us to became parent.
Then we came across MANNAT and met Dr. Archana there. The moment we went there we could feel the positive vives of the place. Staffs were too friendly and cooperative. Dr. Archana gave us hope and turned that hope into reality in very small time span. She make us understand the real situation and what she is going to do to handle that and how that will work very well. Done regular and timely checkups, and answers every possible query even the silliest one.

We were having feelings of something good is going to happen and in the 2nd try only the reults came positive. We are going to be parents soon, and this is because of Dr Archana.
MANNAT came as blessings in our life . Thanku so much Archana mam.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had really bad experience with this clinic, dr.Archanna and her husband who is the director of the clinic. Even we had to take the situation in our hands otherwise we don‚Äôt know how it can go. ****** *** *** ******* *** *** *********** ****** *** *** ******* **** *** ****** ***** **** **** ***** *** ******** *** **** ***** *** **** ** *** ***** Please be careful and check all the bills they make and make sure that all the legal aspects are in your favor and be sure that there is nothing wrong with payments u do to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After seeing the awesome reviews of Mannat we visited this place as we were ttc for quite long. With Dr.Archana Agarwal‚Äôs treatment for few months we got successful results . She is a super doctor who listens to her patients patiently and shows them the correct direction. Whenever we visit her, her positive attitude lifts us up and gives us hope and one can discuss anything with her freely. Dr. Meenakshi too is helpful and supportive, she always answers our queries very patiently. Dr. Kavya is also very good .The sisters (Lidsy, Rajmani and others ) are equally reliable and caring. The two front desk staff are very responsive and prompt . Overall an excellent team .All the medical facilities are excellent and state of the art. We highly recommend Mannat fertility, wish them all the best and pray that everyone seeking help here is blessed by the divine for parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
First I tell thanks to   Dr archana  mam and team,  I was married  on 2014   after  struggle  fertility issue,  we spend all most 10 Laks   in other hospitals    but there is no use  simpley money  losed After  my wife Frind Shanaz   she referred  and we visited  mannath fertlity clinic   and we met Dr Archana mam and he started some  tests and she suggested to go for IVF. She suggested only required reports to be done and we started getting faith in her treatment.  Now finally  my wife 5 month  pregant , no words  tell  thank u thank u  thank u so much Archana mam.*** ** *** **** ********. It was a great experience. Whoever  struggle with infertility  please go mannath fertlitey clinic  100%   you will get success.

Thank you once again, it is wonderful to have hands that create miracles in other peoples live.
 

With kind regards 
Shekarraju....... Sudharani

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ** ***** ******* ** ************ ***** ****** ******* *** force to start the process asap **** ** ***** *** *** ******** and the junior doctor is not professional,  *** ******* **** *** ** **** ********* very painful vaginal scan *** *** ** ****** ** **** *** ****** **** ***** * *** ** **** ** ********** *** ******* **** **** ** *** ****** *** ***** *** ***** ******* ******** **** ******. when I asked doctor Archana about ratio of decreasing AMH rate she could not answer *** ******** and managed to say " in your case it's decreasing very very fast you get admitted asap" ******* *** **************** *** ****** *** ** ****** **** **** **** ** ******* ****** **** In 2-3 visits only we have spent around 30 K for consultation and medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were trying from last 5 years with different doctors in Bangalore and finally met Archana mam at Mannat Fertility after being referred by one of my husband's office colleague. Since I was already 35 by then, mam suggested to go for IVF. She suggested only required reports to be done and we started getting faith in her treatment. Even though, first cycle failed but it was all smooth like egg pickup, embroyo transfer procedures. Staff is really good. Special thanks to Rajmani sis for being like friend and always supporting. Thanks to Sabeeha mam as well for answering all our queries whenever asked. After first failed one, we were told to go for few more reports and exact problem was found. Then I was on medicines for the same and then did transfer. And finally it clicked 3rd time. Today we are very happy and thankful to Archana mam and her team for giving us joy of parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been taking treatment from Dr Archana Agarwal from past few months. It has been a wonderful moment for us to get to know we conceived today. This all happened only because of Archana mam..we will definitely be forever greatful for her. The Doctors were friendly and clear our doubts. The staff was also very friendly. I would like to convey special thanks to Rajmani sister for the care she took. The clinic ambience is also very good, it doesn't feel like u have come to a hospital or clinic. Overall I would definitely recommend Mannat clinic and Archana mam. Thanks a lot and I will all the success to the clinic and patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I  underwent IVF treatment at Mannat Fertility Clinic and I am overwhelmingly pleased with the entire experience. The staff's professionalism and dedication were evident from the initial consultation to the successful outcome. The medical team guided me with expertise and compassion, addressing all my concerns and ensuring a smooth journey through each step of the process.The communication throughout the treatment was clear, and the staff was very supportive throughout the IVF journey.Finally I have concived I would like to thanks Dr Archana and entire team of Mannat fertility clinicI highly recommend Mannat fertility clinic for anyone considering IVF.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Archana Agarwal  is an exceptional gynecologist  who provides compassionate care and  expertise. Her professionalism and warm demeanor instantly put me at ease. She takes the time to listen,thoroughly explains medical details, and ensures all questions are answered. Dr. Archana's commitment to her patients well-being and her depth of knowledge make her an outstanding healthcare professional. I'm grateful to have her as my gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Diagnosis of unexplained infertility,Heavy Periods,Pregnancy,Uterine Fibroids,
review: Finally long awaiting review is here. I have no words to explain how I feel right now. I am so thankful to Archana Maam and Sanjay. I have been going to treatment with Archana for 7 years.  I had couple of IVF treatments done.  I had miscarriages but I never lost hope or trust in mannat. They treated the same way every time I go there. Archana maam knows what she is doing . she is well experienced. Very friendly and has lot of patience. Big smile on the face gives so much relief and confidence. I went for IVF treatment again in June 2022. Currently I am 8 months and waiting for the baby. I can feel the baby kicks and movements which is really good feeling. Thank you Mannat team for everything. Some tips for IVF treatment1. Do not take stress2. Be very normal with your day to day activities3. Go for walk. walking was really helpful for me. but whatever possible.4. Eat healthy food. whole grains, eggs, legumes, veggies, milk or milk products and lots of different fruits. select veggies and fruits with different colors.5. If working then good. if not, then try to be active in your hobbies.6. Practice mindful meditation. take care as if you are already pregnant and be positive. Everything else will fall in place.7. last but not least...pray to God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started my pregnancy journey in 2018, got positive in my 4th attempt IUI procedure in 2018, but fetus heartbeat wasn't there in 8th week. After this I took a gap of 6 months and changed doctor and she again tried 3 IUI and 1 egg pickup and 3 transfers which did not give me any result but ended only in pain of taking injections everyday during the cycle. Lost all the hope and then I read reviews of Mannat clinic and Saw that Dr. Archana was one almost the top doctors and decided to change doctor again and went to Mannat clinic I am 9 weeks pregnant now, I must say the entire team of Dr. Archana know how infertility is troubling our life's. There is positively in the clinic. They majorly focus on what the problem is, like in my case all my reports used be normal but I used to take lot of stress, she suggested to go to healer and that helped me I feelI am sure you will have personal touch in Mannat clinicJust leave everything to Dr. Archana, I am sure she will make you parentsSince I have been to 3 doctors, I definitely see a change here in Mannat clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,
review:
After a long 8 years wait and many tries across various hospitals, we finally hear the good news and this has happened in Mannat Fertility Clinic ,Marathalli , Bangalore and many thanks to Dr. Archana madam for promoting us to be parents

We heard many positive reviews from our friends and also from online reviews, we thought this would be our last try at the clinic and took an appointment at Dr Archana, 

On our first visit we saw the hospital how clean, hygiene and the hospitality we received from doctors and staff. We usually spend more time waiting at the hospital to talk to doctor, but here it wasn‚Äôt that longer wait.

During our first appointment she was very open to listen to all that we have to say about out past history. she was very clear on her plan to do. Though we had couple unsuccessful IVF cycles but Dr Archana used to take it as a challenge, tested few to exactly know the problem. Whenever we talked to Dr Archana her trust gives us a positive vibes and motivations and then finally we have got that positive Cycle. After hearing this it was not just we who were very happy, but all the staff also which felt like a family members. It was a great experiance

Thanks to all the team of Dr Archana (Dr Meenakshi , all Sisters and Receptionist‚Äôs ) who really took care during this process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ****** ** *** ** *** **** *** ********* ****** *** **** I feel very positive every time I visit here which gives me good feeling and comfort. On top of that, the best part is I concieved during my first ivf cycle which itself is¬† dream come true for us. After going through several other centre's to get correct advice, when we reached here, we felt lot of positivity during first visit.Dr. Archana & Mr Sanjay Agrawal explained everything in detail and answered all my questions with patience. We don't get feeling like a hospital when we visit Mannat, as it's so clean and ambience is extremely good and refreshing. Since the ivf treatment involves several visits to the hospital and during this pandemic time it becomes very imp to manage patients waiting lounge with proper care. At Mannat, we enter stress free with sitting areas placed well apart for individual patients with minimal waiting time to seek consultation, which is not the case at other centres in Bangalore.Reception Staff is extremely friendly and reachable all the time. Every single nurse is very good and they care & bother equally for their patients and give useful advice all the time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was not friendly, did not give any suggestions or advice... nothing at all.which was most necessary for a patient.The meeting with doc lasted only 30 secs.Just prescribed Tablets.... without explaining the causes or how to take good care further... nothing was said, which is very disappointing.On top of that, the clinic charged 200 as Covid disposable charges... which is shocking.Just a sanitizer was kept at the reception.I don't think 200 per patient was fair enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited mannat in early December2022 .Dr.Archana understood our issue and identified the problem immediately and started the treatment. What we liked about her was the confidence and positivity she gave us in our initial meeting.The complete environment in mannat was so comfortable and everyone were so friendly,the receptionist welcoming,Dr.Trina who is very gentle and polite with the patients, the team of sisters were very helpful, especially Rajamani sister who was so patient in answering all my queries at any time of the day.Shashi Sir for being so patient in all my blood test routines and special thanks to Ajay Sir.My complete treatment process was smooth under Dr.Archana and Dr.Trina,and have conceived in my first cycle.We are so happy and excited to meet our little one soon.Thanks to everyone in mannat who have supported us in our journey to parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of my friends recommended this clinic a year back, and I was unsure about it. Last week I ended up at the clinic, which isn't a typical medical clinic. Dr. Archana Agarwal and Dr. Trina do not start the discussion with ‚ÄúWhat is the problem?‚Äù but with ‚ÄúYou should be enjoying life out in the world.‚Äù ‚ÄúMedication is for support but you need to change the lifestyle all along‚Äù. That gave me a positive kick in the first ten seconds.Dietician Ms. Neeti didn't give the diet plan directly but focussed on my daily routine for the entire day and offered a custom diet plan.Lastly, the staff isn't just doing their medical support and admin job but as friends and offering smiles to ease you out. This is definitely their personal choice.üòäThank you, everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Mannat fertility clinic for my wife pregnancy checkup. Dr. Archana is genuine doctor. She is very kind, caring, polite and dedicated to her patients. Dr. Archana gives enough time to patients for their doubts and queries. She answered to all our countless queries and doubts so well and time to time provided guidance on how we should approach henceforth. Because of her professionalism we always felt like we were in safe hands and that gave us peace of mind towards our BIG DAY :)

I would like to recommend her 100%.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor wasn't available for long time. I was attended by another doctor till Dr. Archana arrived. The other doctor was sweet. Dr. Archana did guide well about the tests n diagnosis but she felt very intimidating. Also, one of the senior nurse was very judgemental and curious about my personal life, especially because I'm unmarried and have a active sex life. Which made me super uncomfortable. It was a busy weekday for them so for a morning appointment I was stuck there till 2pm in the afternoon.

We had taken appointment with Dr. Archana Agarwal. But the doctor did not attend to the patient. Some other junior doctor at Manthan clinic attended to the patient, even though Dr. Agarwal was available on the floor. The junior doctor insisted on taking unnecessary tests at clinic immediately for a small health issue, though the patient was hesitant and conveyed the same to the doctor. The test was conducted infront  of 3 or 4 nurses, patient felt very uncomfortable and clinic was not sensitive to patient's privacy. The test reports took 5 days, but free consultation on reports are only available for two days post first checkup. Even the reports results were questionable, as tests reported abnormal parameters. 
Adding another small detail not related to diagnosis. Clinic had asked for Aadhar card copy, not sure why it was required for general checkup. Also, the patient form requested information on race and caste, not sure why the information is relevent for doctor checkup.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's a great experience with Dr.Archnana Agrwal madam and Dr.Jhansi  madam and entire staff . I went for PCOD treatment and pregnancy problem ,after couple of  months  I was pregnant. I a m feeling very very happy very very very thankful to Dr.Archana madam and Dr.Jhansi madam and all staff .They are very friendly and humble.Dr.Jhansi explains problem very clearly and listens to every problem ,gives you proper treatment. Clinic environment was very neat and clean.This place definitely has  amazing people .*******Mannat Fertility**************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have tried in many other hospitals n clinics and finally We came here for IVF treatment after got reference from my brother n seeing online reviews . Archana mam is so calm and listened to our concerns n understand our problem. My treatment started but the first IVF got unsuccessful. Archana mam is like motherly figure, she consoled me just like my mother and promised me next time it will be success. And here it is, we are pregnant, in the 2nd attempt. The whole hospital staff is very supportive and caring. Have to mention Minakshi mam, Rajamani Sis n Lincy Sis, they all are very very caring and cares like sisters. Front desk staff Sabina, Tabi n Aruna were very cordial and supportive in all our paper works. All the hospital staff were just a phone call away, always ready to listen and help. I must say as the name Mannat, ur Mannat will also fulfill here. We surely recommend to come here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Such a Great experience! Dr. Archana Agarwal is incredible. Not only has she taken great care of my wife's health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment.We visited for pregnancy problem. We tried  pregnancy for more than 1.5 years but we were not able to conceive.  Then we visited to Mannat Fertility Clinic. Doctor had all the necessary tests and with the help of some medicines only we got success in next month itself by natural process. We are so much happy that we found her. Staff is very friendly and polite.I would highly recommend Mannat for any kind of pregnancy problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited for irregular periods and the treatment was completed with tablets itself. But need to have a patience to conceive. we waited for 4 cycles to get the results and it finally happened when we took a break and stopped medicines for a month. so, peace of mind plus trust on the treatment is the key. The more we stress and think about conceiving, the more it will get delayed.I recommend the doctor to get positive results , but don't rush on the treatment and patiently wait for 3 to 6 cycles to get results. Few Lucky people get success on their first or second cycle itself, so don't compare yourself with them and stress your mind, just understand that everyone's body is different and everyone's response is different to medications, same medicine that works for your friend need not produce results for you. So , have patience, have trust in your doctor, don't get stressed and keep in mind that conceiving is a part of life but it is not the only thing in life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We do not think any amount of words would be enough to share our Thankfulness and Gratitude. We had a struggling experience to conceive due to various reasons including PCOD and Fibroid in Uterus. After visiting Dr Archana Mam, we got a crystal clear understanding on what and where we were failing. After visiting so many doctors I finally felt I met the right Person. She has been so kind compassionate and caring, giving so much time on consultation is rare these days..Under her guidance, medication and follow ups we went with IVF. And to our surprise, I conceived in my first cycle And happily Pregnant :) Cannot ask more...My journey towards motherhood have been such smooth supportive and Specially the immense Care taken by all the sisters, special thanks to Sister Rajmani. Mannat is true to its name...Our prayers are listened!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
